templates.name: What's your warranty policy?
templates.content: You can take a look at our full warranty policy here: https://banded.com/pages/returns#:~:text=institution%E2%80%99s%20billing%20cycle.-,Defective%20Items,-A%20defective%20item If you have more questions or need to start a warranty claim, please fill out this form: https://banded.com/pages/support Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: I was charged sales tax when I shouldn't be.
templates.content: We only charge sales tax in Tennessee and Arkansas - once we fulfill the order and confirm the billing information and order, rest assured we will refund you the sales tax amount.

templates.name: Are X'd out items coming back in stock?
templates.content: If an item has an X over it, it means it's been discontinued and we won't be getting any more of it.

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at info@banded.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: I'd recommend taking a look at our size chart here - https://banded.com/size-chart/ Let me know if you're unsure, I'd be happy to check with you.

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at info@banded.com or give us a call at 1-800-333-5119 Monday-Friday, from 8 am to 5 pm CST. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: What does fill power mean?
templates.content: Fill power is a number that measures the fluffiness and quality of a down product, so it measures the amount of space one ounce of down will occupy in cubic inches. Higher fill power means the down will have better quality, higher loft, and will retain its firmness longer. This is because higher fill power means the down can trap more air which allows for greater insulation.

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to give us a call at 1-800-333-5119 Monday-Friday, from 8 am to 5 pm CST. You can also email us directly at info@banded.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: We ship orders as quickly as possible and most of the year, that's within 1 business day. We usually ship via FedEx, and once shipped it will take 2-3 business days for domestic orders.

templates.name: Restock? (autosend enabled)
templates.content: I currently don't have the exact date of a possible restock, but I recommend checking our website and social media frequently.

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on all orders over $100. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: Post Purchase Inquiries
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to give us a call at 1-800-333-5119 Monday-Friday, from 8 am to 5 pm CST. You can also email us directly at info@banded.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Order Lookup/Tracking
templates.content:
For help tracking your order, please make sure you sign in to your account (register or sign in here: https://banded.com/account/login)

You will be able to access order tracking from your profile page!
